==Puzzles==
===Ruin Scout in Dendro Rock===
Breaking some [[Dendrogranum-Locked Rock]]s will spawn a [[Ruin Scout]]. Follow the Ruin Scout will spawn another Automatons enemy. Defeat them will spawn an Exquisite Chest.

<!-- TODO: Add more enemies -->
Depending on the location, the following enemies may spawn:
*{{Enemy|Ruin Drake: Skywatch}}
*{{Enemy|Ruin Destroyer}}

{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Break the Dendrogranum-Locked Rock)

:'''Paimon:''' Let's catch up and see!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|The mountain that saw the fall of the demons.<br>Hidden among the valleys and verdure, lies a massive machine that has lost its light. ==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The name of the mountain may be a reference to {{Lang|{{w|Devantaka}}|sa=देवान्तक}}, an {{w|asura}} or demigod in Hindu mythology, whose name means "destroyer of gods" in Sanskrit. He appears alongside Narantaka {{Lang|sa=नरान्तक|sa_tl=destroyer of men}} in a number of Hindu legends.
